alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Monroe (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 14 at 3:47PM CDT until May 14 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Audrain County in central Missouri... Southern Monroe County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 347 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Centralia, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mexico, Paris, Madison, and Holliday. This also includes Union Covered Bridge Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
